website_summaries.verdict: A great quality on-camera light that offers plenty of adjustments and customizations.
pros: Features a brightness dimmer and changeable color temperature, so you can adjust to the lighting you need
Includes 3 removable filters, rechargeable battery, and charger
LCD display shows battery life and color temperature
cons: Filters attach by magnets that don't seem very strong

customer_reviews.title: Super bright
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add extra light to my video recording and boy was I in for a surprise. As soon as I turned the light on it illuminated the room and suddenly I could see every spec of dust and every wrinkle in the models face aging her 20 years. This scared me so I used the user friendly interface to turn the light down, to where everything was back to normal 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: eric powers

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light for taking pictures of food at home where my dining room lighting is dim. I wanted an inexpensive light that would work better than the phone flash. The adjustable brightness and white balance features is fantastic. My pictures look a lot more professional with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works but no Warranty Card
customer_reviews.text: Lights works but there was no "Dealer Name/Stamp" on the Warranty card that is required per Viltrox. So I can't register to get the warranty. So even if it works now but something goes bad, you will not have a warranty to get it fixed/replaced.
customer_reviews.author: duckword

customer_reviews.title: Good light for small area
customer_reviews.text: I used this right out of the box for a wedding. The battery life was fantastic and the setup was simple. Love the color control. The only downside was that the light doesn't throw very far so you have to be within 10ft or so of the subject to really help. Lightweight...overall a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Southcoast

customer_reviews.title: Compact, brilliant, flexible lights well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are simply fantastic - small, bright, tunable, long-lasting, and lightweight. I purchased two for night photography and they have a permanent spot in my camera bag. These versatile lights do well with night landscapes and model shoots. My example shot below is of a small cemetery chapel in dense fog. The only light in the shot is two of the Viltrox lights on my Jeep behind the chapel
customer_reviews.author: Tom H Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great portable light source.
customer_reviews.text: I am a portrait photographer that specializes in location shoots. This light is perfect. As you can imagine, perfect natural lighting is not always available. This light weight led panel is ideal. Could be a bit brighter on the 5600k side but overall this little light is dynamite. Attached portrait taken using this light.
customer_reviews.author: Don Pace

customer_reviews.title: Almost a great light.
customer_reviews.text: Just took light out of the box and the quality and controls of the light seem good. I haven’t shot anything with it yet because the light came with the cold shoe adapter molded out of square to the light- so it aims to the right on my Panasonic HC-X1 camcorder. I took the mount apart and it appears to be a bad molding and not something that can be adjusted...
customer_reviews.author: M. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: I own three
customer_reviews.text: I shoot video and have used these guys for main lights and rim lighting as well. They work great for someone shooting interview videos and must travel light. Don't forget to use modifiers, as you don't want to make your clients look like deer in the headlights. Bouncing off of white objects (white board, etc.) works well, but you lose power that way. They connect together as well, which makes it easier to get more power. The Sony NPF battery that comes with it is small and will last around 1 hour at full power. A bigger battery like the 750 lasts very long.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great for DSLR starter light
customer_reviews.text: High quality video light with well written instructions. The frosted screen is held on by 4 magnets and stays on well, yet is easily removed. LCD display is easy to read and has color temperature and battery life displayed. The battery snaps into place solid and has a lock/release tab. The only improvement I could see is to move the hot shoe mount from the right side to the left side. The input for the microphone is on the left side of my Canon. I will look for another way to mount the Rode microphone.
customer_reviews.author: LoWang

customer_reviews.title: Good light, weak battery.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this light and had the chance to break it in today for a video shoot. It’s awesome and and does what it needs to do, however the battery did not hold up as advertised. I used it at 100% at 4400 temp and had one bar of battery life after 30 minutes of use. Fortunately, I had access to an outlet and was able yo quick charge (3 separate times). Is this a faulty battery? Also, should this unit have come with a ac/dc wall adapter? I’d appreciate a response regarding my experience, however I’ll continue to use the light and offer a future review.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Better than Flash ?
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for digital photography. It works great for objects as well as portraits. Its a nice even light that you can control both the strength and the color temperature. It takes a little experimentation, but for the price, its a no brainer. For portraits or stills, i try to get an exposure reading right off the subject and then use exposure lock. The results are impressive. I recently saw a rumor that Canon has applied for a patent to use a small version on upcoming cameras.
customer_reviews.author: truthbtold

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Buying this item was a total disaster for me, i bought it for a job and in the middle of shooting on first use the light went off, i tried charging the battery but it was not even charging. It was really embarrassing! Not buying Viltrox again.
customer_reviews.author: Murtala Baba

customer_reviews.title: I bought two, only one works now.
customer_reviews.text: I have these 2 since April. My use of them is occasional, but when i used them, they worked well. I noticed one of them started to give me issues like a month after, the on and off switch. Unfortunately the issue has become worse. Now one of the devices won't stay on, it will only shine light when the on switch is pressed firmly, but when i take my finger off the device, it turns off. When they do work, i like the quality. I guess i got a bad one that failed completely within the 6 months. To be honest, i will buy another one, and maybe that one will work fine, i'll give it another chance.
customer_reviews.author: O. Monge

customer_reviews.title: An incredible light for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic amount of control on this compact battery powered light. Color shifting is excellent as are the magnetic color filters included. Readout of color and battery charge is outstanding. Only complaint, and not even that severe, is that magnetic color filters have wimpy magnets and might fall off easily. Other than that, value of this light is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value!!
customer_reviews.text: While I haven't had this video light long my initial thoughts are this is an incredible value. The light works as advertised, and included all the necessary accessories (e.g. battery, charger, filters, etc.) One unit puts out a ton of light. Additionally, the light intensity is adjustable to support shooting in a variety of different settings. Only time will tell on how it will hold up but based on what I've seen to this point I would definitely recommend the product!!
customer_reviews.author: Neversummer

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile and handy. Great for online sales photos.
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is good. It provides a good amount of light. I like that you can change the color temperature and it also has a dimmer on it as well. I like that it uses a standard, readily available, camera battery. The battery lasts pretty good. I would like the charger to be a little faster. It takes a few hours to charge it from one bar. That being said, I like it and plan on getting another one to replace my large reflector style light. I use it for taking pictures for online sales. It works great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Marty800

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact you can change the color temp on this as sometimes I use it in sunlight, other times inside under fluorescent lights. I use it for live streaming for school, so I needed a power supply. Needs to be 5.5/2.1mm, center +, 12V This is the one that I bought:
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I like the light, but magnet difuser doesn't engage
customer_reviews.text: [Good] Unlike L116T model I bought before, brightness adjustment works well. [Bad] Diffuser magnets are off-set against main body (1/8" off) so they don't engage. I am using a elastic cord to hold it. Typical bad Chinese product sample. Neewer CN-216 cover is simple and trouble free without magnets...3rd pic.
customer_reviews.author: Onsenboy

customer_reviews.title: VILTROX VL-162T CR195
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with the VILTROX VL-162T CR 195 Fill light. What I like the most about the light is it's ability to change the temperature of the light as well as the intensity. The fill light makes it easy to get the right look your wanting for your photo. I also like the fact that it comes with four (4) color lenses making it perfect for any lighting situation. The VILTROX VL 162T has a rechargeable battery that has an extremely long life. I have yet to have the fill light battery die on me before I was done filming. -M. Greg Feinman
customer_reviews.author: Martin Feinman

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Great light, brightness and temperature adjustable..comes with colored filters, easy mounted and together with temperature adjustments provide wider color spectrum.. I am using it for product photography, on my tripod, directly on camera, light and it can be adjusted for different angles.. Really happy with product, wanted to test this one and ordering one more soon..
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for the price/size.
customer_reviews.text: For small-scale projects, like lighting a single subject, this panel is super handy. The adjustable color temperature, portability and easy tripod mounting has allowed it to be a great supplemental key/fill light for a few shoots! The color gels are kind of corny unless you're going for a really dramatic lighting color, but the neutral one helps to make the LEDs less harsh on the subject's eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Sandel

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but effective light
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive light to brighten my background when doing videos when I ran across this item. it truly exceeds my expectations and puts out a large amount of light that I could not get from my other bulky lights. It mounts on my camera as well a tripod. It also allows you to turn down brightness or increase which I was not able to get from my other lighting source.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Elaonp

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I needed a small portable light that I could adjust the brightness on and love the filters also it keeps it from looking like a flashlight but delivers light to where I need it. And also the battery life is awesome. The model is Elena Generi I had shoot with.
customer_reviews.author: scott holt

customer_reviews.title: could not recharge battery
customer_reviews.text: The lighting unit was good but the battery only lasted maybe 1 hr 20 min at minimum setting (20% brightness). The battery came fully charged. After the battery was used up, the charger could not charge the battery again. Although, the battery charger showed a green light, indicating it was fully charged. Had to return the light due to the battery problem.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this unit you cant get any better. It feels very solid, seems to be built very well. I have used it for many many hours now with out issue. You can very much spend as much money on your lights as you did your camera, but with this there is really no need, I've used it on a tripod and on multiple cameras. Being able to adjust the light temp and brightness is very helpful. All in all I can say enough good about it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great light! Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The light is great! The company is amazing. I had an issue with one of the batteries and the company attempted to send me a new one but they weren’t able to get it shipped from China since covid is effecting shipping right now. So they sent me money to order a new battery on Amazon. Great costumer service! The light is fantastic. It is great to have so much control over the light and the gels are a nice bonus that come with it! For the price these babies are perfect! Just wish they also came with the plug for the wall as a backup for when the battery dies.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Battery has very little life
customer_reviews.text: This does not come with an AC adapter. The battery that comes with it lasts less than an hour. I tried a universal adapter but it doesn't seem to work. If you need a light with any sort of longevity, I'd say look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jesseca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nighttime pictures or even video
customer_reviews.text: This light can be really bright! Be careful on getting too close to subjects, but I haven’t really put it to too much use yet, Ive used it for some night time shots with friends and it really works with getting lighting in places that are way too dark for the camera to pick up. Real great product, would recommend because it also has panels to put in front of the light to change colors, or there is a button to change the intensity of the light.
customer_reviews.author: Re-Imagine Studio

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be great so far
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned one of these, but wanted to have a light to use as a fill light and to get a little more light on the subject when shooting video of meetings, etc. So far I really like it. I've bought an extra battery for it and the charger so far works fine on both batteries. I like the easy adjustment of brightness and color temperature, and so far the hot-shoe mounting foot seems to be great. I've only had it for a few days but so far am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke when I attached it to my camera. The little square that slides into the hotshoe slot was improperly welded and snapped off. So now I have no way to attach it to my camera, and superglue won't help. The brightness is nice, but hardware is bad quality. Wish I had time to exchange it before I photograph a wedding tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Holli

customer_reviews.title: Great lights. Wish they came with ac adapter
customer_reviews.text: Nice little lights. Great features and light output for the price. Temperature and brightness adjustment work super easily. It’s nice that it uses a very standard battery type. Comes with diffuser, color filters, battery and battery charger. Only downside is that it didn’t come with an A/C adapter
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent LED Photo/Video Light!
customer_reviews.text: I shoot food in dark restaurant settings and this thing was just perfect for what I needed. The quality of the build is very good and the batteries seem to last forever for my personal needs. You can get a power pack (sold separately) if you need to leave it on for an extended period of time for a video shoot if needed, but in my experience, I rarely charge them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great entry product, but feels a tad cheap.
customer_reviews.text: The lights are cheap and bright. I like that you can change the kelvin on the back with the knobs and the brightness as well, you just have to click the knob and turn. I’d recommend this for anyone trying to take videos or pictures. It adds a nice effect in pictures and allows you to film during nighttime.
customer_reviews.author: IT Security Guy

customer_reviews.title: God Product, however not as bright as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product is very well built and sturdy. Does an extremely good job if you use it on your camera and the subject is not too far. however, if the subject is more than 2 meters away, then this light does not suffice the need. I really liked the fact that the product is well made and light. The magnetic attachments are really handy. overall does a fair job and value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I must say, I actually have not charged this light once since I got it months ago. It seriously has the best battery life ever. It is more convenient for indoor use but definitely works for outdoor use as well to help with shadows. I am a professional photographer and am always looking to get new fun accessories for my camera. I like to try out new things to improve my photography.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Dotts

customer_reviews.title: Great as a portable spot light for handheld setups
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these for all 3 of my camera setups. They're light, battery efficient, and pretty bright for the size. They come with an opaque diffuser that attaches magnetically. The 3rd one I received also came with colored (red, green and blue) screens as well but I didn't receive that with my previous orders. Despite that, I am pleased with these lights. I would also use them as maybe fill lights or lighting a background. I have multiple sets of Viltrox lights, big and small, and I've been pleased with all versions. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not  Impressed
customer_reviews.text: You need to buy a cord to plug this in it is unique to Vitrox wants they $18 for this. The battery doesn't hold a charge very long and frequently dies in the middle of web conference. The charger is made very poorly and I don't believe it will last long. I don't recommend! I plan on returning this!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Whatever

customer_reviews.title: Short term life. Both lights now have stopped working. Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Lights started out great! After 3 months of occasional use one of the lights stopped working. Today almost 6 months later the other light stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Engen

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Amazing light for the price. Perfect for video. The hotshoe did break after a second use but this company replaced it after a half refund for the hotshoe. And you can put this on a tripod without the hotshoe as it has a place you can screw in the tripod mount.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great starter for your streamer.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter streams cosplay every weekend and was moving around a bunch of different lamps in her room to get the lighting right. She has been so happy with this. The color filters are fun and work well. As much as I wish it came with the AC adapter, for the price I understand why it didn't. Overall, she's very happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brant G Burington

customer_reviews.title: Great light if you’re in the market for one
customer_reviews.text: This video of light is amazing it is well built for the money and very bright with adjustable dimmer switch and adjustable temperature recommend to anybody that needs a good light and the battery light is amazing I’ve only charged it one time and you’ve used it for three interviews
customer_reviews.author: Chad sholly

customer_reviews.title: Bright, but power source is poor.
customer_reviews.text: The brightness is great, and the adjustable color plates it comes with, but the battery will not hold a charge, so I have to keep it plugged into a power source, which is VERY inconvenient when trying to do shoots outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: amk07

customer_reviews.title: It's budget friendly, it works, and the battery-life is pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! I've started using it for shooting weddings and it's a game changer. Using a flash similar to this one was actually recommended by this amazing photographer @_swabbie_ and I can't thank her enough. It's budget friendly, it works, and the battery-life is pretty great!
customer_reviews.author: pachy

customer_reviews.title: Seem's to be a great light
customer_reviews.text: I really haven't had the opportunity to use the light a great deal of time But, it's made well, bright with the ability to dim the brightness. easy to mount on a stand. I expect this unit to work out well. can be used for emergence use also. I'm buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy10

customer_reviews.title: Returned these
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't even tell they were turned on. The light isn't bright and doesn't help wash a scene at all. The plastic covers that are supposed to change the light didn't make any difference. I think mine had to be defective or the unit is just low quality.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyHudson

customer_reviews.title: Great for us beginning filmmakers!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a good get. You can set the temp and the intensity with ease. I would like to have the battery last longer but I also feel like everyone would like to have a few more hours out of there battery powered light lol They do the job, especially if you're on a budget. I bought two and they've lasted my for months now!
customer_reviews.author: Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Mounts perfectly on the top of my DSLR and works great for sit down videos. Adds a super professional look. The colored filters are fun too. The battery life is pretty good unless it's on 100% brightness, then it dies pretty quickly. For the price, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: basillover372

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like it's size and it was quite bright. Battery life was fair, will know later in the year as some batteries seem to drain quicker over time. I didn't really like the color shades it made the light dimmer But for the white light it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: I love the versatility, battery operated, dimmable
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used the colored filters yet, but this is a great way to bring light into the situation in low light, or when you want to accent something in shade. Can get very bright at 100%, is dimmable, and the battery isn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: D. McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Best light I have for video cam
customer_reviews.text: I love in fact that I can use an external 12v battery Battery stay on the Tripod and light stays on super bright with out have to change battery, battery does not have long lite sihining. Need Keep changes battery . I really like this light I have 3
customer_reviews.author: Omar Jor-el

customer_reviews.title: Almost a perfect cheap alternative to Aputure F7.
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Very bright, very versatile, light looks good too. Just wish the light bulbs weren't so exposed and had some clear plastic in front to protect them. Docking one star for that. The hot shoe mount for the light is crap but that is forgiveable given the price of this.
customer_reviews.author: CodecMan

customer_reviews.title: Great light for the money
customer_reviews.text: Just got this. Looks good, solid piece of gear. I love that you can easily adjust the brightness and the color temperature, with a clear read-out for those things plus battery life. The battery and charger feel a little on the cheap side with fit, but otherwise everything feels solid. I havent had it long enough to report on battery life. It is plenty bright for my needs. I will probably use it around the 20% mark for vlogging at my desk, and there is plenty of brightness for small room shoots. I will probably get another of these for my collection of lights.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Veenstra

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular LED light because I could adjust brightness from 100 percent to 20 percent with everything in between. Great little light. I plan on purchasing more since they can attached to each other.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. May

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights & Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: These lights have helped tremendously on bando hunting trips. I love their adjustability, brightness and temp. I had an issue with the screen on one of the lights. I contacted the seller, sent them pics, and they replaced it immediately. No fuss and very courteous.
customer_reviews.author: Mena

customer_reviews.title: Incredible light for video
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look and feel of this unit. The adjustement controls really helps (rotary knob not hi/lo). The light is fully adjustible and I even ordered an AC charger from Walmart (Amazon vendor charges 8 dollars more).
customer_reviews.author: Captain PaulTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the money. Plenty bright.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I ended up buying a second one for my girlfriend whom also does photography. I use it for hiking at night as well. This is a great product and is in my camera bag always. The kelvin reads backwards, but hey, it’s pretty outstanding that it can change temps in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Bright enough to light up people, but not football fields.
customer_reviews.text: This is one awesome light! I read so many reviews that said the light wasn't bright enough. It makes me wonder if they were trying to light up a football field, because for videography purposes, this light is more than bright enough, even at 20%. It is well made and I love having the ability to point the light various directions, while atop my camera. I definitely plan to purchase more of these. I'm thinking 2 more should do the trick for me. I am unsure of the battery life, since I haven't had a chance to put it in action. This is a steal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Very Capable Light
customer_reviews.text: Although I wish the initial camera mount was metal than plastic. Because normal wear and tear has a weakening affect on plastic; aluminum could have been used. But other than that it does what it says and the light is very bright. I'll be using it in a video for sure in a wedding coming up. It looks great and high in quality. I made a good purchase. Beware of lights that don't come with charger or battery you can end up paying more separate.
customer_reviews.author: Savy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good portable LED light but color filters are useless
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, some other buyers have said it didn’t come w the color filters. Mine did otherwise I would have returned it, so I bought it on a gamble. However, the blue filter doesn’t alter color of light at all somehow and blue was the color I wanted most. The green is more of a lime yellow and the red is dull. Good quality LED light though, good control of brightness, mounts well and nice battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Apricot!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my makeup pictures and I absolutely love it!! My makeup pictures are soooo great!! I use to use a ring light and this connect right to my ring light stand so it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: yonita grenada

customer_reviews.title: Off to a good start
customer_reviews.text: Only used once thus far, but easy use and fit standard tripod mount no problem. Used as lower fill light for video interview project. Was a decent value and hope to use colored filters soon.
customer_reviews.author: R. McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use light with good battery life. If you need a reasonable amount of light, and don't expect this to perform like a $200 light, you'll be very satisfied. No complaints for some up close portraits and to use as fill.
customer_reviews.author: John Craft

customer_reviews.title: Great little light..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery life and versatility....good enough light output for my purpose all while not being too big or bulky ..I will definitely buy it again ..I'll update if my thoughts and feelings change ..
customer_reviews.author: littleshotter

customer_reviews.title: Met my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this product long so I cannot speak to the battery life. But I am very impressed with it so far. It seems to scatter the light nicely not leaving hotspots. I’m also very impressed with the ability to, at the turn of a knob, change the color temperature. That is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: HDinCincy

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: These were a great find! I was able to test straight out of the box. As far as the life of battery I haven’t used long enough to say yay or nay. I am pleased with my purchase and would recommend anyone looking to take the leap! The light is very bright, I was concerned so I did order more than one. I would order more just to have them as back ups, Greta deal!
customer_reviews.author: JRC1993

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I am a wedding videographer and someone knocked down the tripod and the neck by which the light stands up broke. It was a soft fall on the carpet. I've had this light for a week and only used it twice, but the neck that connects to the camera is plastic and fragile. Would recommend going with something more sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Alenka

customer_reviews.title: SUPER BENEFICIAL
customer_reviews.text: The brightness on this LED is amazing. A lot of the time I'm at less than 50% power because of how much light it provides. The colored gels are great when you're trying to dial in your temperature properly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex T.

customer_reviews.title: You Get a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I just got this light. The light brightness is adjustable; the 4 filters come off and on very easy with the magnets mounted on the body of the light. Your getting a great value in getting a light, battery and charger.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great Dimming Scale, Good Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: There's a surprising amount of flexibility to the dimmer. Very low to exceedingly bright, no doubt good for a myriad of situations. The battery life is good as well. Fairly fast charge to full life.
